org.jaffre

Interface JaffreReturnFrameSerializer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultJaffreReturnFrameSerializer

    public interface JaffreReturnFrameSerializer
    Author:
    Alexander Veit

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JaffreReturnFrame deserialize(InputStream p_in)
      Deserialize a JaffreReturnFrame.
      void serialize(JaffreReturnFrame p_frame, OutputStream p_out)
      Serialize a JaffreReturnFrame.

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        void serialize(JaffreReturnFrame p_frame,
             OutputStream p_out)
               throws IOException,
                      JaffreSerializeException
        Serialize a JaffreReturnFrame.

        Note: this method must be thread-safe.

        Parameters:
        p_frame - The frame to be serialized.
        p_out - The output stream.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If p_frame or p_out is null.
        IOException - If an I/O error occurred.
        JaffreSerializeException - If the frame could not be serialized for some reason.

      • deserialize

        JaffreReturnFrame deserialize(InputStream p_in)
                              throws IOException,
                                     ClassNotFoundException,
                                     JaffreSerializeException
        Deserialize a JaffreReturnFrame.

        Note: this method must be thread-safe.

        Parameters:
        p_in - The input stream.
        Returns:
        The deserialized frame, or null if no more frames are available on the input stream.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurred.
        ClassNotFoundException - If the class of a serialized object cannot be found.
        JaffreSerializeException - If the deserialized object was not a JaffreReturnFrame.
